TopicTitle: How to hide part costs in VAB/SPH in Career Mode?

Articles.Content:
Hey there! I have a very niche need with a video series I'm doing, and would like to know if there is any mod, or really just any way in general, to have all part costs hidden in the VAB/SPH when building crafts. I want the costs to still count towards the total and everything, but I'd like to hide the cost of the parts as I'm hovering over them and seeing new information. 

Is there any way to get the game to omit that information? Thanks for your time!
I dont think there is a way to do it in stock ksp and im not aware of any mods to do so.
